posts.text:
Er með til sölu sirka 3mán gamla PC vél, keypt erlendis. Selst í heilu lagi, engin skipti.
CPU: Intel Core i7-8700K 3.7 GHz 6-Core LGA 1151
móðurborð: ASUS Republic of Gamers Maximus X Formula LGA 1151 Z370 ATX
Minni: G.Skill Trident Z RGB 16GB (2x8GB) DDR4 PC4-28800C16 3600MHz
SSD: Samsung 512GB 960 PRO M.2 Internal SSD
Skjákort: Asus STRIX GTX1050Ti 4GB 
Kæling: Corsair Hydro Series H100i v2 Liquid CPU Cooler
Kassi: NZXT S340 Elite
PSU: EVGA SuperNOVA 850 G3 850W 80 Plus Gold Modular
2x Corsair ML120 Segulviftur PWN
Hljóðkort: Soundblaster Z
Verð: 
220þ
 
190þ
. 170þ án skjákorts.
** SELT **
